oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1949-11-26 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from November 26, 1949. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Red Foley (host, performer), Hank Williams (performer), Jimmy Riddle (performer), Rod Brasfield (performer), Helen Harris (performer), Little Jimmy Dickens (performer), Minnie Pearl (performer), and Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys (performer). Transcribed from Titania-Palast, Berlin, Germany. Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/618
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red Foley; Minnie Pearl; Rod Brasfield; Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Red Foley) -- This World Is Not My Home (Red Foley) -- Red Foley and Grant Turner introduce Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Rod Brasfield) -- Red Foley introduces Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys -- I Saw The Light (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- Every Step Of The Way (Red Foley) -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Roy Acuff calls) -- Closing statement (Red Foley) -- Closing statement (Grant Turner) -- Songs By Morton Downey commercial
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Titania-Palast (Berlin, Germany); Turner, Grant; Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Riddle, Jimmy, 1918-1982; Brasfield, Rod; Harris, Helen (Singer); Dickens, Little Jimmy, 1920-; Minnie Pearl; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys
